ComicInfo.Summary:
SHATTERED REFLECTIONS - Part One
Calie has returned to Wonderland with new powers, ready to end the reign of madness that has plagued her and her family's lives for so long. Unfortunately for her, Wonderland has other plans... plans that include the creation of one of the greatest adversaries Calie has ever faced.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Dawn McTeigue & Ula Mos | 1 | B | Cover B | Vincenzo Cucca & Ylenia Di Napoli | 2 | C | Cover C | Sean Chen & Stephen Schaffer | 3 | RE | Wizard World Louisville/St. Louis Exclusive Cover, Limited to 500 | Chris Ehnot & David Delanty | 4 |
